message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $12000 by us. Considering its potential impact on your endeavors, I propose a special introductory price of $10800 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide exceptional value while ensuring we align on a fair transaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist further.
